chapterinfo.title: Becoming a member
chapterinfo.corpauthor: C3B Interoperability Profiles Capability Team (IP CaT)

section.para: If you wish to have further information on the NISP or the NATO C3B Interoperability Profiles Capability Team (IP CaT), please contact:
section.address: Mr. Kenneth DeWandel Tel: +1-757-747-3547 E-Mail: kenneth.dewandel@act.nato.int
